shadowverse:FriendOfTruth.NAME: Honest Cohort
shadowverse:FriendOfTruth.FLAVOR: Expose yourself to the deepest truths—the qualities, faculties, and reality of this plane.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, spellboost all the cards in your hand and draw pile #b1 time. Put 1 #yshivs into your hand.

shadowverse:Eleanor.NAME: Eleanor, Cosmic Friend
shadowverse:Eleanor.FLAVOR: I am the Cosmic Flower, as well as a friend of yours. For me and you shall I bloom gloriously! For that is me, Eleaner Gloria!
DESCRIPTIONS: For the first #b3 turns, randomly add #b1 0 cost #yPetrification , #yConjure #yTwosome or #yStaff #yof #yWhirlwinds to your hand.

shadowverse:EnchantedLibrary.NAME: Enchanted Library
shadowverse:EnchantedLibrary.FLAVOR: Quiet, please. Noise upsets the books. -A poster in the Enchanted Library
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the first #b2 turn, put #b1 #yskill into your hand from draw pile.

shadowverse:EarthEssenceRelic.NAME: Earth Essence
shadowverse:EarthEssenceRelic.FLAVOR: I daresay the fruits of my research should take my magical abilities to still greater heights!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 Earth_Essence.

shadowverse:Mysteria.NAME: Mysteria, Magic Founder
shadowverse:Mysteria.FLAVOR: It's always around us, and always with you.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add #b1 #yMysteria, #yMagic #yFounder into your draw pile and gain #b
Strength .

shadowverse:Genius.NAME: Genius Among Geniuses
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the 8th turn, deal #b61 damage to all enemies.

shadowverse:MissLethal.NAME: Missed Lethal
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 [E] at the start of your turn. Once a time, whenever a non-Minion enemy's HP is lower than 1/5 by the start of turn, apply #yIntangible .

shadowverse:Offensive.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play the first #ySkill card in a combat, gain [E] .

shadowverse:NeutralBook.NAME: Neutral Book
DESCRIPTIONS: Active 3 times for an Act, Enemies drop an additional neutral card reward.

shadowverse:BlackPinya.NAME: The Black Pinya
DESCRIPTIONS: You feel more talkative.
@Pinyapipi!@

shadowverse:GoldPinya.NAME: The Golden Pinya
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn,randomly put 1 #yDutiful #ySteed, #yBullet #yBike, or #yArcane #yPersonnel #yCarrier into your hand.

shadowverse:KMR1.NAME: Balance Changes1
shadowverse:KMR1.FLAVOR: To achieve better game balance,we're making changes to enemies.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, all enemies gain #b8 block .

shadowverse:KMR2.NAME: Balance Changes2
shadowverse:KMR2.FLAVOR: To achieve better game balance,we're making changes to enemies.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, all enemies gain #b1 strength .

shadowverse:Offensive2.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive2.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: Everytime you use #b5 cards in the same turn, deal #b2 damage to all enemies.

shadowverse:SixMark.NAME: Mark of the Six
shadowverse:SixMark.FLAVOR: Fear not ruin, one must merely endure eternity.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, randomly apply 1 Vulnerable, Weak,  #yChoke , #y-1Strength #ythis #turn, #yTalk #yto #ythe #yHand,  Poison to all enemies. Each of these debuff can be applied only once.

shadowverse:ArisaBOSS.NAME: Quintitanias
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . NL Gain [E] whenever you play the #b6th card in a turn.

shadowverse:NiouKyuu.NAME: Two-Crown Bow
shadowverse:NiouKyuu.FLAVOR: The dignified jewels embedded in this bow gaze into eternity, identifying possible threats to peace. One arrow loosed from its string can put an end to those threats.
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL enemies start combat with #b1 #yPinpoint #yPrey .

shadowverse:LymagaWeapon.NAME: Judgment Rising
shadowverse:LymagaWeapon.FLAVOR: Those slashed by her supreme blade, Judgment Rising, will be consumed by thorns and returned to the earth.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, put a 0 cost #yGreenwood #yGuardian into your hand.

shadowverse:GlassOfIC.NAME: Iceschillendrig's Glass
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, deal equal amount of damage to ALL enemies.

shadowverse:KyoukaBOSS.NAME: Cosmo Blue Rod
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . Whenever you play 6 #ySkill cards, the next #ySkill card will be played #btwice .

shadowverse:Mimori.NAME: Being normal
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage dealt + #b10%, damage taken - #b10%. By the end of your turn, if you have played at least 5 cards, damage dealt + #b10% (Up to 5 times). If you take any unblocked damage, damage dealt - #b10% .

shadowverse:KuonWeapon.NAME: Mitsura Ryakketsu
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add 1 #yShikigami #ySummons into your hand.

shadowverse:GeassRelic.NAME: Geass: Survive
DESCRIPTIONS: One time per combat, when you would die, heal 1 HP, remove all of your debuffs, gain #b5 #yStrength and #yDexterity , gain #b25 #yBlock .

shadowverse:Offensive3.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive3.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yNecromancy 3 :  Put 1 #yZombie into your hand.

shadowverse:BurialGround.NAME: Burial Ground
DESCRIPTIONS: By the end of your turn, gain #b1 #yShadows .

shadowverse:LunaBOSS.NAME: Luna's Friend
shadowverse:LunaBOSS.FLAVOR: Would you like to be Luna's friend?
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . At the start of your turn, #yNecromancy 4 :  Add 1 #yLitch to hand.

shadowverse:Todoroki.NAME: Scythe of Thunder
shadowverse:Todoroki.FLAVOR: Language breeds both good and evil. Only silence creates equality.
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL enemies lose #b1 buff(Lose #yArtifact first.) at the start of combat.

shadowverse:TailRelic.NAME: Mask of Great Fox
shadowverse:TailRelic.FLAVOR: Life is fleeting, mortals the flickering figures in a shadow play. Is it not odd?
DESCRIPTIONS: Start the combat with #b1 #yOne-Tailed #yFox added to your draw pile. If you have played #b9 #yOne-Tailed #yFox this run, add #b1 #yGinsetsu, #yGreat #yFox to your deck instead.

shadowverse:InfernalCrown.NAME: Infernal Crown
shadowverse:InfernalCrown.FLAVOR: The dead are but empty vessels. Crude, earthen cups drained by the god of death. Pour, then! Fill the vessel and make it dance.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yReanimate #b3 at turn #b2 , #yReanimate #b4 at turn #b3 , #yReanimate #b5 at turn #b4 .

shadowverse:Alice.NAME: Special Idol
shadowverse:Alice.FLAVOR: Alice's show is about to begin~
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever #yNecromancy is activated, deal #b3 damage to ALL enemies.

shadowverse:Offensive4.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive4.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: When a combat is over, #yVengeance : Heal #b7 HP. Othervise, heal #b4 HP.

shadowverse:IriaBOSS.NAME: Vermillion Bite
shadowverse:IriaBOSS.FLAVOR: 尽管臣服于妾身伟大的力量之下吧!
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时失去 #b2 点生命.回合结束时回复 #b4 点生命.

shadowverse:LustRelic.NAME: 抱拥之翼
shadowverse:LustRelic.FLAVOR: 爱意相融, 情意相交.沉溺在欲望之中, 水乳交融吧.
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗开始时, 获得 #y虹吸 .

shadowverse:Lusia.NAME: 我没有兴趣
shadowverse:Lusia.FLAVOR: 影之诗不过是道具而已.
DESCRIPTIONS: 进入 #y复仇 时, 获得 [E] .

shadowverse:Pendant.NAME: 夜之王的吊坠
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时,  复仇 则获得 #b1 点 力量 . 狂乱 则获得 #b7 点 格挡 . 渴望 则抽 #b1 张牌.

shadowverse:BerserkRelic.NAME: 提特迦玛利
shadowverse:BerserkRelic.FLAVOR: 悬挂活剥, 将一切吃干抹净!
DESCRIPTIONS: 进入 狂乱 时, 回复 #b7 点生命.

shadowverse:LonePromise.NAME: 约定的花朵
shadowverse:LonePromise.FLAVOR: 取代颈部刻印的  ――是向冰冷肌肤所赠予的饯别花朵.  而相伴的螺丝则为华丽舞踏过的回忆.
DESCRIPTIONS: 前 #b2 回合开始时, 增加 #b1 张 #y修复模式 到手中.第 #b2 回合开始时额外抽 #b1 张牌.

shadowverse:RevelrySeed.NAME: 斗争之种
shadowverse:RevelrySeed.FLAVOR: 可不要让我感到无趣哦？
DESCRIPTIONS: 你和全体敌人初始获得 #b3 点 力量 .

shadowverse:Offensive5.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive5.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, draw #b1 card if number of cards in your deck is even. Othervise, increase count by #b1 . heal #b8 HP and gain #b8 Gold when count reaches #b8 .

shadowverse:NemesisBOSS.NAME: 猫(玩偶)
DESCRIPTIONS: 进入 共鸣 时, 获得 [E] .退出 共鸣 时 增加1张 #y眩晕 到弃牌堆中.

shadowverse:ArtsMaster.NAME: 破邪之因迪拉
shadowverse:ArtsMaster.FLAVOR: 我存在于天地, 无咎于世间.
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合结束时如果有剩余能量, 获得 #b5 点格挡, 下回合额外抽 #b2 张牌, 对全体敌人造成 #b5 点伤害.

shadowverse:WhiteRelic.NAME: 白之章
shadowverse:WhiteRelic.FLAVOR: 破坏完成之后, 浮现的笑容是纯洁的正义.
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当消耗攻击牌时, 给予随机敌人 #b1 层 #y虚弱 .如果拥有 #y黑之章 , 战斗开始时将 #b1 张 #y圣白破坏的创造物 加入手中.

shadowverse:BlackRelic.NAME: 黑之章
shadowverse:BlackRelic.FLAVOR: 破坏完成之前, 浮现的笑容是污秽的邪恶.
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当消耗攻击牌时, 给予随机敌人 #b1 层 #y易伤 .如果拥有 #y白之章 , 战斗开始时将 #b1 张 #y圣白破坏的创造物 加入手中.

shadowverse:Knife.NAME: 杰西尔的匕首
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗结束时, 增加 #b1 点计数.受到伤害时, 失去 #b1 点计数.当计数为 #b3 以下时, 战斗开始时增加1张 #y小刀 到手中. #b3 以上时, 改为 #y发现 . #b6 以上时, 改为 #y至高无上·宽容 .

shadowverse:TranquilCog.NAME: 静谧的齿轮
shadowverse:TranquilCog.FLAVOR: 定理, 无须完美契合即可运转.
DESCRIPTIONS: 前 #b3 回合开始时, 如果 共鸣 额外抽 #b1 张牌, 否则额外抽 #b2 张牌.

shadowverse:Offensive6.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive6.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: Can be activated #b3 times per combat. Right click to add #b1 #yEvolution #yPoint into your hand.

shadowverse:OliviasBlessing.NAME: Olivia's Blessing
shadowverse:OliviasBlessing.FLAVOR: Evolve? Lemme give it a shot.
DESCRIPTIONS: Can be activated #b5 times per combat. Right click to add #b1 #yMiracle and #b1 #yEvolution #yPoint+ to your hand.

shadowverse:WindGodsBlessing.NAME: Wind God's Blessing
DESCRIPTIONS: Rally #b10 : By the end of turn, ALL #yFollowers gain + #b1 /+ #b1 .

shadowverse:Conscription.NAME: Conscription
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you don't have any #yFollower , summon 1 #yKnight .

shadowverse:Spineblade.NAME: Argentum
shadowverse:Spineblade.FLAVOR: Go ahead, hunger. Once the craving overtakes you, claim what is rightfully yours. That is the true way of the world, after all.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yLoot , draw 1 card.

shadowverse:ValhoreanDealer.NAME: Valhorean Dealer
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click to spend #b30 gold to redraw any number of your hand.

shadowverse:KagemitsuSword.NAME: Enma Yasukuni
shadowverse:KagemitsuSword.FLAVOR: Thanks to you, I have drawn my blade from the scabbard called peace. -Kagemitsu, Matchless Blade
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL cards with disupgrade ability will upgrade again after being played.

shadowverse:EndlessUsurpation.NAME: Endless Usurpation
shadowverse:EndlessUsurpation.FLAVOR: Take and take again. Awaken the world to the pain of loss, to grief as deep as Hell. Leave them nothing, that they may know our hatred.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add 1 random #yLoot to hand.

shadowverse:Durandal.NAME: Durandal the Incorruptible
shadowverse:Durandal.FLAVOR: A holy sword bound to a certain proud hero. Its blade will shine for eternity, never to break or tarnish.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 2 #yBuffer .

shadowverse:Tree.NAME: Naterran Great Tree
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add 1 #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree to hand.

shadowverse:AlterplaneArbiter.NAME: Cross Craft
shadowverse:AlterplaneArbiter.FLAVOR: Limited Time New Format: Cross Craft. Build decks with cards from 2 different classes!
DESCRIPTIONS: Randomly choose 1 different shadowverse class, enemy drop an additional card reward of this class.
Enemy drop an additional card reward of
#yRunecraft
#yForestcraft
#yShadowcraft
#yBloodcraft
#yPortalcraft
#ySwordcraft
#yHavencraft

shadowverse:Offensive7.NAME: Token of 1st
shadowverse:Offensive7.FLAVOR: I go first, no need to redraw.
DESCRIPTIONS: Everytime you draw a #yCurse into your hand, move it to the Amulet Zone as a #yCountdown #b3 #yDivine Amulet. If it's the first time in this combat, draw #b1 card.

shadowverse:Savior.NAME: 救世主
shadowverse:Savior.FLAVOR: 在安息中, 与己身的内心对峙吧.
DESCRIPTIONS: 如果回合中没有打出过攻击牌, 下回合开始时获得 #b4 点 格挡 .

shadowverse:GrandShield.NAME: 背理盾·塞农
shadowverse:GrandShield.FLAVOR: 翼之纹章是自由的证明.其为神所遗落的奇迹之盾.
DESCRIPTIONS: 回合开始时, 增加 #b1 张 #y圣骑兵 到手中.

shadowverse:GrandSword.NAME: 逆理剑·理夏尔
shadowverse:GrandSword.FLAVOR: 奇迹之剑足以扭曲道理, 屏蔽天理.
DESCRIPTIONS: 一回合一次, 获得 格挡 时获得 #b2 层 荆棘 .

shadowverse:BishopBOSS.NAME: 辉煌羽饰
shadowverse:BishopBOSS.FLAVOR: 当羽翼展翅之时, 身体将不受重力束缚.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st .增加1个护符栏位.如果你的生命值低于最大生命值的一半, 每回合开始时额外获得 [E] .

shadowverse:HeresyAvatar.NAME: 邪教化身
shadowverse:HeresyAvatar.FLAVOR: 炽天使的末路, 已与纯白背道而驰.
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当抽到诅咒牌时, 获得 #b1 层 #y人工制品 .如果这张诅咒牌可以打出, 其耗能变为0.

shadowverse:ErisRelic.NAME: 司祭的权杖
shadowverse:ErisRelic.FLAVOR: 为这残酷的世界带来救赎.
DESCRIPTIONS: 护符结束 倒计时 时, 获得 #b2 点 #y临时生命 .

shadowverse:IminaRelic.NAME: 疯狂的咒器
shadowverse:IminaRelic.FLAVOR: 赞美吧, 凡人.吾之外再无他神.
DESCRIPTIONS: 战斗开始时, 给予随机敌人 #y疯狂的咒器 .

shadowverse:KyaruBOSS.NAME: Chaos Grimoire
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . At the start of combat, enemies' Max HP reduce by #b18% .

shadowverse:AnneBOSS.NAME: Anne's Spellbook
shadowverse:AnneBOSS.FLAVOR: O, spirit of war! Heed my call!
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . The #ySkill cards you played are considered as #yMysteria cards.

shadowverse:KokkoroBOSS.NAME: Ames Amulet
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . Whenever you play the #b6th card of that turn, gain #b1 #yStrength and #yDexterity . NL HP healed in combat increases by #b50% .

shadowverse:MiyakoBOSS.NAME: Sweet Ghost Pudding
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . 3 times per combat, at the start of your turn,  #yNecromancy 6:  Add 1 #yApparition to hand.

shadowverse:IoBOSS.NAME: Glamour Whip
shadowverse:IoBOSS.FLAVOR: Yes! You called for your teacher~?
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . Once per combat, when #yFatal , randomly upgrade a card in your deck.

shadowverse:RalmiaBOSS.NAME: Omega Drive
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . Once per combat: When you gain #yResonance , ALL Attacks in hand are considered as #yAF cards; When you lose #yResonance , ALL Attacks in hand are considered as #yMachina cards.

shadowverse:ShizuruBOSS.NAME: Sacred Blade
shadowverse:ShizuruBOSS.FLAVOR: Your big sister will always protect you!
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . Whenever you play an #yUpgraded card, gain #b1 #yBlock. Once per combat, gain [E] when you play #yEvolution #yPoint .

shadowverse:YukariBOSS.NAME: Eternal Mug
shadowverse:YukariBOSS.FLAVOR: Ehehe, I wanna go home early to have a drink~
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st . Whenever you heal your HP, gain #bPower #bDamage #bImmune . NL Whenever you draw a #yStatus or #yCurse card, draw #b1 card.

shadowverse:ShinobuBOSS.NAME: Grim Soul Rope
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yToken #yof #y1st .At start of your turn, #yNecromancy 4:  Add 1 #ySkullfather to your hand.

shadowverse:Bullet.NAME: Mystical Bullet
shadowverse:Bullet.FLAVOR: It's kind of an amulet. Just don't lose it, please.
DESCRIPTIONS: Relic with unknown use.
Bullet of Fate, shattering the world.

At the start of the 1st, 3rd turn, add 1 #yVerdict #yRendered to hand. NL At the start of the 2nd, 4th turn, add 1 #yAbsolute #yDecree to hand. NL At the start of the 5th turn or after, add 1 that you don't have in hand.
